casebody.data:
VROOMAN, Appellant, v. HOUSTAN, W. ST. & P. FERRY R. CO., Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. May 17, 1894.) Action by Lyman C. Vrooman against the Houstan, West Street & Pavonia ■Ferry Railroad Company.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

Lamb, Osborne & Petty, for appellant. Coudert Bros., for respondent.

No opinion. Motion for leave to appeal to the court of appeals denied, with $10 costs. See 27 N. Y. Supp. 1128.
